meanings.definition: A class of organic compounds containing two phenyl groups attached to an amine group.
meanings.sent1: Diphenylamines are molecules with two phenyl parts connected to an amine piece.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study diphenylamines to understand their chemical structure.
meanings.sent3: The diphenylamines at the party were the life of the chemical reaction!
meanings.sent4: Her love for chemistry was as strong as the bond between the phenyl groups in diphenylamines.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, diphenylamines look like tiny interconnected rings.

meanings.definition: Chemical compounds used as antioxidants in various industries.
meanings.sent1: In the factory, workers add diphenylamines to products to prevent oxidation.
meanings.sent2: The use of diphenylamines has increased in the food industry to extend shelf life.
meanings.sent3: The antioxidants in diphenylamines fought off the harmful molecules like superheroes!
meanings.sent4: Her skin glowed with health, as if she had been preserved by diphenylamines.
meanings.sent5: The presence of diphenylamines in the formula kept the colors vibrant for longer.
